pull.title: rpc: Return block time in getblockchaininfo
pull.body: Return tip time in `getblockchaininfo`, for some use cases this can save a call to `getblock`.

events.body:
ACK b17bb4c37d58ca49e877983a632bfcaa493be993.
I can indeed see how this is useful.

Concept ACK, could use a test asserting on the value, needs this change for the CI to be green:

```diff
diff --git a/test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py b/test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py
index 90715cae26..24dc668ea0 100755
--- a/test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py
+++ b/test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py
@@ -93,6 +93,7 @@ class BlockchainTest(BitcoinTestFramework):
             'pruned',
             'size_on_disk',
             'softforks',
+            'time',
             'verificationprogress',
             'warnings',
```

@naumenkogs: I think you ACKed a commit not belonging to this PR?

Happy to review and test as soon as the CI is happy (see https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22407#pullrequestreview-702077013) :)

ACK c86e001c9731aee055fa9660154b804cdfbb12e2

Does this need a release note?

Sorry for acking the wrong hash.
ACK c86e001c9731aee055fa9660154b804cdfbb12e2.

tACK c86e001c9731aee055fa9660154b804cdfbb12e2.

Tests in `test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py` also check out successfully.

@theStack I think this change should have a release note like `getnetworkinfo` did when the `connections_in` & `connections_out` fields were added in [`v0.20.0`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/release-notes/release-notes-0.21.0.md#updated-rpcs). It could be something like:

```
`getblockchaininfo` now returns a new `time` field, that provides the chain tip time. (#22407)
```
Concept ACK, but agree with @Zero-1729 that this needs release note.

Approach ACK c86e001c9731aee055fa9660154b804cdfbb12e2

I would add a release note for this, the one proposed [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22407#pullrequestreview-704318016) is good.

Additionally, I would add an assert for this as suggested here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22407#pullrequestreview-702077013
``` diff
diff --git a/test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py b/test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py
index 24dc668ea..f7290ff22 100755
--- a/test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py
+++ b/test/functional/rpc_blockchain.py
@@ -99,6 +99,8 @@ class BlockchainTest(BitcoinTestFramework):
         ]
         res = self.nodes[0].getblockchaininfo()
 
+        assert isinstance(res['time'], int)
+
         # result should have these additional pruning keys if manual pruning is enabled
         assert_equal(sorted(res.keys()), sorted(['pruneheight', 'automatic_pruning'] + keys))
```

events.message: rpc: Return block time in getblockchaininfo

events.body:
ACK 20edf4bcf61e9fa310c3d7f3cac0c80a04df5364

Now includes a release note in `doc/release-notes.md` and [the proposed assert](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22407#pullrequestreview-708972505) in the functional test.
